document_data.mainbody:
Blood sausage, or black pudding, was a somewhat uncommon type of sausage found in Faer√ªn.
In the Western Heartlands and the city of Baldurs Gate, now could find platters filled with an assortment of grilled, fried, baked, and boiled blood sausages, served with a ramekin of dipping sauce. These dishes were referred to as Black Pudding Platters.
